title: Gold Prize (₩2,000,000)
event: Korea University College of Informatics NE:XT Software Contest
details:
(1) Awarded by the College of Informatics at Korea University.

(2) Led the development of AI services for the dating assistant app Rendi.

title: Honourable Mention (₩300,000)
event: Digital Competition of the Nat’l Program of Excellence in Software
details:
(1) Awarded by the Ministry of Science&ICT.

(2) Developed an OOD classification model for detecting fake audio.

title: NIA Director's Award (₩3,000,000)
details:
(1) Awarded by the Ministry of Science&ICT and the National Information Society Agency.

(2) Developed a Korean speech recognition model tailored for the elderly and children.
